mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.datetime,project_id projectId,leader,IFNULL(b.num,0) num,IFNULL(attendance,0) attendance,IFNULL(a.totalTime,0) totalTime, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET(c.userNumber,a.leader)) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET(c.userNumber,a.leader) ) AS leaderName FROM maintenance a LEFT JOIN (SELECT maintenanceId,COUNT(id) num FROM maintenanceRecord WHERE `type` = 1 GROUP BY maintenanceId ) b ON maintenanceId = a.id WHERE a.datetime = #{datetime} AND project_id = #{project}

SELECT a.id,a.datetime,project_id projectId,leader,COUNT(b.id) num,IFNULL(attendance,0) attendance,IFNULL(a.totalTime,0) totalTime, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET(c.userNumber,a.leader)) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET(c.userNumber,a.leader) ) AS leaderName FROM maintenance a JOIN maintenanceRecord b ON maintenanceId = a.id WHERE a.id=#{id} AND b.type = 1 GROUP BY maintenanceId

SELECT ANY_VALUE(a.id) id,ANY_VALUE(a.datetime) `datetime`,project_id projectId,ANY_VALUE(leader) leader,COUNT(b.id) num,ANY_VALUE(IFNULL(attendance,0)) attendance,ANY_VALUE(IFNULL(a.totalTime,0)) totalTime, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(c.userNumber ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET(c.userNumber,ANY_VALUE(a.leader))) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET(c.userName,ANY_VALUE(a.leader)) ) AS leaderName FROM maintenance a JOIN maintenanceRecord b ON maintenanceId = a.id WHERE project_id = #{project} AND b.type = 1 GROUP BY maintenanceId

SELECT a.id id,b.id maintenanceId,a.type,a.content ,IFNULL(a.datetime,0) `datetime`,IFNULL(a.people,0) people, IFNULL(a.workingHours,0) workingHours,IFNULL(a.defectNumber,0) defectNumber,overtime (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET(c.userNumber,a.people)) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET(c.userNumber,a.people) ) AS peopleName FROM maintenanceRecord a LEFT JOIN maintenance b ON b.id = a.maintenanceId WHERE b.datetime = #{datetime} AND b.project_id = #{project}

SELECT id,maintenanceId,type,content,IFNULL(datetime,0) datetime, IFNULL(people,0) people,IFNULL(workingHours,0) workingHours,IFNULL(defectNumber,0) defectNumber, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET(c.userNumber,a.people)) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET(c.userNumber,a.people) ) AS peopleName FROM maintenanceRecord a WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id ,maintenanceId,type,content,IFNULL(datetime,0) datetime,IFNULL(people,0) people, IFNULL(workingHours,0) workingHours,IFNULL(defectNumber,0) defectNumber, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET(c.userNumber,a.people)) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET(c.userNumber,a.people) ) AS peopleName FROM maintenanceRecord a WHERE maintenanceId = #{maintenanceId}

SELECT id ,maintenanceId,type,content,IFNULL(datetime,0) datetime,IFNULL(people,0) people, IFNULL(workingHours,0) workingHours,IFNULL(defectNumber,0) defectNumber, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(c.userName ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET(c.userNumber,a.people)) FROM users c WHERE FIND_IN_SET(c.userNumber,a.people) ) AS peopleName FROM maintenanceRecord a WHERE type = 1 AND maintenanceId = #{maintenanceId}
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(people) FROM maintenanceRecord WHERE maintenanceId = #{maintenanceId} AND TYPE = 1;
